sentences.en: I should never attempt to palliate my own foible by expose the error of another.
sentences.cn: 我从不想暴露别人的错误,以图减轻自己的缺点.

sentences.en: We all have our little foibles .
sentences.cn: 我们大家都有各自的小毛病。

trans.tran_en: a small weakness or strange habit that someone has, which does not harm anyone else
